name: Freestyle Scooter - Scootering Game
description:
New 3D Freestyle Scootering game for your mobile has arrived!

If your passion is the extreme sport of riding trick scooters you have come to the right place. Take your freestyle scooter and hit the skate park, performing a number of tricks and stunts.

Do slides, flip and jump tricks, 360’s, all without falling off.

* Easy to use controls
* 3 Awesome freestyle scootering skate parks to master

If you love skating, skateboards, scooters or BMXing then this is the game for you
